descriptionSet.description: On this calendar from Jacob & Co.'s Biscuits a fair-skinned lady wearing a pink sari sits on a chair and pours tea from a tea pot into a cup. The cup is placed on a tray together with a plate of biscuits, one of which reads 'Jacob Biscuit', a sugar bowl and a milk jug/creamer. The tray is set on a table. (sp) Like a frame around this image several brands from Jacob & Co.'s Biscuits are depicted in their packaging.

hra:item.hra:value: description-en: On this calendar from Jacob & Co.'s Biscuits a fair-skinned lady wearing a pink sari sits on a chair and pours tea from a tea pot into a cup. The cup is placed on a tray together with a plate of biscuits, one of which reads 'Jacob Biscuit', a sugar bowl and a milk jug/creamer. The tray is set on a table. (sp) Like a frame around this image several brands from Jacob & Co.'s Biscuits are depicted in their packaging. (cb)

text-en: 573 [damaged number, bottom left]

explanatory comments/crosstagging: Finally and perhaps most interestingly, images of the modern home also promised women autonomy. In all the images discussed thus far, women appear on their own, free to spend their time as they please, whether reading a book, talking with friends, or sitting quietly in a chair doing nothing. When they sit down for tea, women often enjoy it on their own; in these images no children demand attention, no husband asks to be served, no older women intervene to make decisions; the ubiquitous mother-in-law to which a young wife would have to give deference, has been banished from the scene. (Abigail McGowan) (gs)

explanatory comments/crosstagging: The lady is wearing symbols of status: an elegant women's wrist watch made of leather and gold, a gold ring (indicating she is married, in 'Western style'), a pearl necklace, rouge and lipstick. She confidentially looks at the 'camera' outside the frame, smiling gently (but not seductively). She is a 'modern homemaker' (serving herself, not being served by a servant!) who has leisure time at her hands and knows how to enjoy with style. () (cb)
